name.baseName: 原料破碎|生物质热解气|生物质|热解气化|所有规模

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 此数据集描述了适用于各种生产规模的生物质热解和气化过程，在该过程中，原料经破碎和热分解以产生生物质热解气。尾端处理技术（例如布袋过滤器）被用于捕获颗粒物（PM2.5 - PM10），以减少向大气中的排放。这种污染控制技术的高技术效率使其适用于专注于可再生能源和合成气生产的大型生物质处理设施，以及旨在遵守严格环境标准颗粒排放的行业。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码45,四级代码4520文件，在完整版文件中第2499页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management97，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为97，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设备耗电量（千瓦时/年）/（除尘设备额定功率（千瓦）×除尘设备运行时间（小时/年））。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
源文件中描述为为生物质热解气，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
污染物指标工业废气量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为工业废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
